org.youscope.addon.component

Interface ComponentAddonUI<C extends Configuration>

  • Type Parameters:
    C -
    All Superinterfaces:
    AddonUI<ComponentMetadata<C>>
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    DropletControllerConfigurationAddon<C>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    CellDetectionJobAddonUI, ComponentAddonUIAdapter, ControllerJobConfigurationAddon, FluigentJobConfigurationAddon, GenericComponentAddonUI, MeasurementAddonUIAdapter, MicroplateJobConfigurationAddon

    public interface ComponentAddonUI<C extends Configuration>
extends AddonUI<ComponentMetadata<C>>
    An addon providing a user interface for the configuration of a component.
    Author:
    Moritz Lang

    • Method Summary

      • Methods inherited from interface org.youscope.addon.AddonUI

        toFrame, toPanel

    • Method Detail

      • setConfiguration

        void setConfiguration(Configuration configuration)
               throws AddonException,
                      ConfigurationException
        Initializes the addon to the configuration data. Must not be called after toXXXFrame() or toPanel() was called.
        Parameters:
        configuration - The configuration data.
        Throws:
        AddonException - Thrown if error occurred while processing configuration data.
        ConfigurationException - Thrown if configuration is invalid.

      • getConfiguration

        C getConfiguration()
        Returns the configuration data. If toXXXFrame() or toPanel() was called already, it is expected that the addon commits all current edits to the configuration. Otherwise, a default configuration should be returned. If possible, the configuration should be at a valid state, which is however not necessary (see Configuration.checkConfiguration()).
        Returns:
        Configuration data or NULL, if addon was not yet configured.

      • addUIListener

        void addUIListener(ComponentAddonUIListener<? super C> listener)
        Adds a listener to this configuration, which should e.g. be informed if the configuration finished.
        Parameters:
        listener - The listener to add.

      • removeUIListener

        void removeUIListener(ComponentAddonUIListener<? super C> listener)
        Removes a previously added listener.
        Parameters:
        listener - The listener to remove.

      • getAddonMetadata

        ComponentMetadata<C> getAddonMetadata()
        Description copied from interface: AddonUI
        Returns the metadata (like human readable name) for the addon.
        Specified by:
        getAddonMetadata in interface AddonUI<ComponentMetadata<C extends Configuration>>
        Returns:
        Metadata of the addon.
